import React, { Component } from 'react'; // import { BrowserRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import './Reward.css'; class Reward extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.username = React.createRef(); this.password = React.createRef(); this.my_refs = {} this.state = { desc: '', days: "1", path: '', prevSelect: '' } this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this); this.focusByID = this.focusByID.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.server = "http://localhost:5000"; } handleSubmit(){ document.getElementById(this.state.path).focus() console.log(this.state.path) fetch(this.server + "/createReward", { mode: 'cors', credentials: 'include', method: 'POST', headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials': true, }, body: JSON.stringify({ goalCount: this.state.days, desc: this.state.desc, img_path: this.state.path }) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { this.props.history.push("/profile"); }); } focusByID(id, url){ // if (this.state.prevSelect != ''){ // var curr = document.getElementById(this.state.prevSelect) // // curr.style.border = "1px solid black"; // // // // curr.style.transform = "scale(1)"; // curr.style.transition = "all 0.2 ease-out"; // } document.getElementById(id).focus() // focus.style.border = "2px solid #4AB3F4"; // focus.style.transition = "all 0.2 ease-in-out"; // focus.style.transform = "scale(0.8)"; //document.getElementById(id).focus() // let myRef = this.my_refs[id]; // if(myRef){ // console.log('focusing on ', id, myRef); // myRef.focus(); // } //this.setState({prevSelect: id, path: url}) this.setState({path: url}); } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } handleChange (e){ this.setState({days: e.target.value}) } render() { return (
Reward Selection

It's time to set another reward!

Description:

Goal (in number of days):

Choose your reward:

this.focusByID('icecream', 'icecream')}>
this.focusByID('bowling', 'bowling')}>
this.focusByID('baking', 'baking')}>
this.focusByID('beach', 'beach')}>
this.focusByID('book', 'book')}>
this.focusByID('card', 'card')}>
this.focusByID('carnival', 'carnival')}>
this.focusByID('chess', 'chess')}>
this.focusByID('fire', 'fire')}>
this.focusByID('game', 'game')}>
this.focusByID('gift', 'gift')}>
this.focusByID('hamburger', 'hamburger')}>
this.focusByID('hotdog', 'hotdog')}>
this.focusByID('pizza', 'pizza')}>
this.focusByID('makeup', 'makeup')}>
this.focusByID('movies', 'movies')}>
this.focusByID('picnic', 'picnic')}>
this.focusByID('shopping', 'shopping')}>
this.focusByID('puzzle', 'puzzle')}>
this.focusByID('teddy', 'teddy')}>
this.focusByID('tennis', 'tennis')}>
this.focusByID('sneakers', 'sneakers')}>
this.focusByID('clothes', 'clothes')}>
this.focusByID('jewelry', 'jewelry')}>
this.focusByID('kart', 'kart')}>
this.focusByID('ball', 'ball')}>
this.focusByID('bike', 'bike')}>
this.focusByID('ferris', 'ferris')}>
this.focusByID('paint', 'paint')}>
this.focusByID('swimming', 'swimming')}>
); } } export default Reward;
